text:
In the 2002-04-23 nightly build, these script files in the /bin
directory are not executable by default (granted, it's trivial
to 'chmod +x' them), while other script files _are_.

My CVS book indicates that the easiest way to correct this is to
change the permissions of these components in the CVS repository.
creator: mramshaw@alumni.concordia.ca

text: Thanks - I changed the permissions of the CVS files, hopefully it works.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
